attributes.action: Make lobby members of parliament a criminal offence.
attributes.background: I'm a father who's been through the family court process and suffered many of the pitfalls and injustices of an outmoded legal system.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what kind of lobbying you would like to be made illegal. Individual constituents, charities, civil society groups, businesses and others all lobby Members of Parliament. 

If you would like a certain kind of lobbying to be made illegal, you could start a petition about that.
